articles.title: Nord Stream 2 pipeline leaks appear to have stopped, say Danish authorities - Sky News Australia
articles.description:
Danish authorities believe the Nord Stream 2 pipeline carrying natural gas from Russia to Europe appears to have stopped leaking.

Western nations have accused Russia of inflicting the damage that caused the leaks in an act of "sabotage".

articles.title: Ukraine accuses Russia of kidnapping nuclear plant director as thousands of Putin's troops surrounded in Lyman - Independent.ie
